member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.FindCorrespondingEditorTextSnapshot(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Text.SourceText)
member.summary:
Returns the ITextSnapshot behind this SourceText, or null if it wasn't created from one.
Note that multiple ITextSnapshots may map to the same SourceText instance if ITextSnapshot.Version.ReiteratedVersionNumber doesn't change.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetWorkspace(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextBuffer)
member.summary: Gets the workspace corresponding to the text buffer.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetRelatedDocumentsWithChanges(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshot)
member.summary: Gets the s from the corresponding that are associated with the 's buffer, updated to contain the same text as the snapshot if necessary. There may be multiple s associated with the buffer if the file is linked into multiple projects or is part of a Shared Project.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetOpenDocumentInCurrentContextWithChanges(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshot)
member.summary: Gets the from the corresponding that is associated with the 's buffer in its current project context, updated to contain the same text as the snapshot if necessary. There may be multiple s associated with the buffer if it is linked into multiple projects or is part of a Shared Project. In this case, the is responsible for keeping track of which of these s is in the current project context.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetRelatedDocuments(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextBuffer)
member.summary: Gets the s from the corresponding that are associated with the . There may be multiple s associated with the buffer if it is linked into multiple projects or is part of a Shared Project.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetDocumentWithFrozenPartialSemanticsAsync(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Text.SourceText,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Tries to get the document corresponding to the text from the current partial solution associated with the text's container. If the document does not contain the exact text a document from a new solution containing the specified text is constructed. If no document is associated with the specified text's container, or the text's container isn't associated with a workspace, then the method returns false.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.Extensions2.GetEncodingOrUTF8(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextBuffer)
member.summary:
Get the encoding used to load this if possible.
Note that this will return if the didn't come from an , or if the is already closed.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.ITextSnapshotLineExtensions.GetFirstNonWhitespacePosition(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshotLine)
member.summary: Returns the first non-whitespace position on the given line, or null if the line is empty or contains only whitespace.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.ITextSnapshotLineExtensions.GetFirstNonWhitespaceOffset(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshotLine)
member.summary: Returns the first non-whitespace position on the given line as an offset from the start of the line, or null if the line is empty or contains only whitespace.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.ITextSnapshotLineExtensions.GetLastNonWhitespacePosition(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshotLine)
member.summary: Returns the last non-whitespace position on the given line, or null if the line is empty or contains only whitespace.

member.name: M:dnSpy.Roslyn.EditorFeatures.Extensions.ITextSnapshotLineExtensions.IsEmptyOrWhitespace(Microsoft.VisualStudio.Text.ITextSnapshotLine)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified line is empty or contains whitespace only.
